issue.title: [Java] Sql type DATE should correspond to DateDayVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to SQL convertion, sql type DATE should correspond to a format of YYYY-MM-DD, without the components for hour/minute/second/millis

Therefore, JDBC type DATE should correspond to DateDayVector, with a type width of 4, instead of 8.
